approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit and internal requirements.
Reduce dependency on the IT team for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency in accessing and managing V-KYC recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This process is manual and time-consuming. This project aims to streamline the process by providing a self-service portal.

requirements.description: The system shall allow users to upload a CSV/TXT file containing a list of LAN IDs (up to 50).
The system shall trigger a backend API call to process the request upon file upload.
The system shall display the results in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table shall have pagination displaying 10 records at a time.
The system shall download a maximum of 10 records at a time.
The recording shall be visible if searched by LAN.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Ability to upload a CSV/TXT file with LAN IDs.
Trigger backend API to process the request.
Display results in a tabular format.
Implement pagination for the table (10 records per page).
Limit downloads to 10 records at a time.
Allow searching of recordings by LAN ID.
non_functional_requirements: Access to the portal restricted to Team Leaders and Process Managers.
success_criteria: V-KYC team leads can easily access and download recordings.
Reduced dependency on IT for recording retrieval.
Improved efficiency in audit and internal processes.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
File will contain min 2 and maxmium 50 LanIDs
assumptions: The backend API for processing requests exists or will be developed.
The necessary infrastructure for the portal is available.
risks: Technical issues with the NFS server.
Security risks related to data access.

recommendations: Add more detail on the backend API functionality.
Specify the security measures for data access.

identified_gaps: Security requirements are not fully defined.
